text: Mattu manavanige sankatavenadaru tattidare, avanu tannodeyanedege olidu, avanige more iduttane. Taruvaya avanu (allahanu) atanige tanna anugrahavannu daya palisidaga, atanu i hinde tanu yarige more ittiddenembudanne maretu biduttane mattu allahanige paludararannu nemisuttane â€“ avaru atanannu avana (allahana) dariyinda duragolisi biduttare. (Anthavanige) heliri; tusukala ninu ninna krtaghnateya sukhavannu anubhavisu. Ninu khandita narakavasiyagiruve
